metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16826 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The coff_slurp_line_table function in coffcode.h in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29.1, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory access and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted PE file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04').
